title: Mid-term Examination Schedule
content:
**Important Notice**

Mid-term examinations will be conducted from **January 15-20, 2024**.

**Schedule:**
- Mathematics: January 15, 9:00 AM
- Physics: January 16, 2:00 PM
- Chemistry: January 17, 9:00 AM

Please ensure you bring your student ID and necessary stationery.

title: Annual Tech Fest Registration Open
content:
ðŸŽ‰ **Annual Tech Fest 2024** ðŸŽ‰

Registration is now open for the Annual Tech Fest to be held on **January 25, 2024**.

**Events include:**
- Coding Competition
- Project Showcase
- Technical Quiz
- Innovation Challenge

**Registration Deadline:** January 20, 2024

Contact the Student Council for more details.

title: Library Hours Extended
content:
The library will have **extended hours** during the examination period.

**New Timings:**
- Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM
- Saturday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
- Sunday: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Study rooms are available for group study sessions.

title: Sports Meet Postponed
content:
Due to inclement weather, the **Annual Sports Meet** has been postponed.

**New Date:** February 5, 2024

All registered participants will be notified individually. Practice sessions will continue as scheduled.

title: Career Counseling Session
content:
**Career Counseling Session** for final year students.

**Date:** January 18, 2024
**Time:** 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM
**Venue:** Auditorium

Topics covered:
- Resume Building
- Interview Preparation
- Job Market Trends
- Higher Education Opportunities

Registration required. Limited seats available.

title: WiFi Maintenance Notice
content:
**Scheduled WiFi Maintenance**

Campus WiFi will be under maintenance on **January 12, 2024** from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM.

**Affected areas:**
- Academic Block A
- Library
- Student Center

Alternative internet access will be available in the Computer Lab.
